A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Very disappointed in this addition. It stole so many scenes from Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi that it leaves one wondering if there was more rehashed content than original. Sadly\, it doesn't even improve on those original scenes\, but rather simply replays them with more CGI and less actual tension or suspense.

I would go into further issues with plot holes\, missing backstories\, and "If they could do something like that\, why have they never done that before?" moments\, but this movie just isn't worth the time to explain them all.

The popcorn is strong with this one.
